name: Beef Spaghetti Sauce
description: This Beef Spaghetti Sauce is a perfect blend for those looking for a high-protein, low-carb, and low-sugar option to add to their healthy recipe collection. Infused with the fresh herbal notes of thyme, basil, and marjoram, and richly seasoned with salt and pepper, this sauce promises a robust flavor that enhances any pasta dish.

recipeInstructions.text: Finely dice the red onion, capsicum (green and red), and set aside.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the extra virgin olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Add the diced onions and capsicum to the skillet and saut√© until they are soft, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the ground beef to the skillet, cooking until browned, about 8 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Mix in the tomato puree, salt, ground pepper, thyme, basil, and marjoram. Reduce heat to low and let simmer for 15 minutes to allow flavors to blend.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5
